38916.affected_area: Sylvan Lake (North of Sylvan Lake & Norglenwold)
live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38916.summary: Some customers in the North of Sylvan Lake and Norglenwold are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38916.title: June 26 – Sylvan Lake (North of Sylvan Lake  & Norglenwold) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
